questions.text: What color is the Gyrocopter in this level?
questions.explanation:
Dark Green.

	Although it is hard to tell from a distance, the Gyrocopter is actually a really dark green.  You can get a good view of the Gyrocopter while smashing it with the Guru.

questions.text: How many guards do you feed to the crocodile in all?
questions.explanation:
Nine.

	When you feed guards to the crocodile, there are actually nine altogether.  Remember, you feed four of each type of guard; the guards with whips and kangaroo guards.  This makes eight.  You also feed one large flashlight guard to him, totaling nine guards.

questions.text: How many scorpions do you collect in the first half of the level using the big truck?
questions.explanation:
Eight.

	During the first half of scorpion collecting, Murray collects eight scorpions.  Once you have collected all eight scorpions, Bentley tells Sly to dig deeper since the scorpions stopped coming.

questions.text: How many scorpions do you collect during the second half of the session with the big truck?
questions.explanation:
Twelve.

	Once you see the video with Bentley telling Sly to dig deeper, Sly has to climb the drill to get it to go deeper.  The levers are on the very top.  Once you have pulled the levers, the water disappears, so Murray has four more scorpions than last time to collect, and he must rely on nothing but blue scorpions to cool the tires down.

questions.text: How many times did the mask actually escape?
questions.explanation:
Three.

	The mask escaped three times.  The first time was when Murray fought the mask from the kangaroo in the cave and the second time it escaped was when the crocodile tried eating it.  The third and final time was from the dingo in the lemonade bar.

questions.text: How many people wore the mask throughout this level?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	The first person seen wearing the mask was the kangaroo in the cave with Murray.  The next few were when Murray tried feeding guards to the crocodile, the one in the lemonade bar, when Murray tried smashing it, and then Carmelita.  The mask was finally destroyed when Carmelita's men destroyed it.

questions.text: What is the minimum amount of throws it takes for Murray to destroy the spinning drills?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	Murray must throw the kangaroo wearing the mask at three different drills to open a door.  Each drill takes two hits to be completely destroyed.  Once you have hit all three twice, you have thrown the guard six times.  The door then opens and you can move forward.

questions.text: Which of the following is not something the guru turns into in this level?
questions.explanation:
Flower pot.

	The Guru can change into several items.  Of these are a pile of sticks, a bush, and a rock.  He changes a total of three different things in each level.  He never turns into a flower pot during this level.  He does, however, turn into a flower pot during "Flight of Fancy".  The Guru is a purple creature with yellow clothing.

questions.text: Do you get the paraglide for Sly during this level?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	You do indeed get the paraglide in this level.  The paraglide can help Sly glide from far distances.  The higher you are, the farther you go!

questions.text: Do you get the adrenaline burst in this level?
questions.explanation:
No.

	You get the adrenaline burst earlier in the game, during "An Opera of Fear"  The adrenaline burst helps Bentley cover far distances fast.  It is simila.r to Sly's rocket boots.  This can help when you want to run away from guards or larger fights.
